data.text:
@MomokaRage Symptoms: vomiting on your boss's shoes so that they actually know you're sick

This is beyond disgusting that people treat Covid this way

@MomokaRage Its counter intuitive but what they are saying is correct, some individuals may be fine and still test positive.  Obviously if you feel sick you should take care of yourself, when you feel better you would be okay to go back to work after 10 days or so.  Numbers vary ofc
